name: Uh-Oh Love Comes to Town
description:
Gino and I made a dating sim of the Pulse Pounding Heart Stopping game jam! The original idea was that you played as the unbelievably cool friend of a typical dating sim/harem everyman and had to help him get a girlfriend.

It kept that theme but ended up going down a pretty different route than I originally planned. I have to say it was probably for the better though?
